creator: mcary@callidussoftware.com
text:
The descriptions for most of the sql Task's parameters are missing.  Some large
chunk of text just above the Examples section of the page is not there.  

Documentation appears to be the same as far back as 1.5.1 .  Unfortunately my
environment/project is such that testing against 1.6 or 1.7 is not doable.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
You could look at the online version of the 1.6beta manual
http://ant.apache.org/manual-1.6beta/

For me (Mozilla 1.5) the sql.html page renders fine, everything seems to be there.

creator: mcary@callidussoftware.com
text:
(Note downgrade to minor -- if there was a pedantic I'd set it -- original bug description was based on a misinterpretation of the manual style. Sorry for lost time.) Using Mozilla 1.4, both the beta 1.6 manual and manuals for 1.5.1 and 1.5.4 show the following. Note the hanging 'The' just before the Examples section:

classpath

Sql's classpath attribute is a PATH like structure and can also be set via a nested classpath element. It is used to load the JDBC classes.

The

Examples

<sql
    driver="org.database.jdbcDriver"
    url="jdbc:database-url"

    userid="sa"
    password="pass"
    src="data.sql"
/>

Fixed in cvs head and 1.6 head
Thanks.
creator: peter.reilly@corvil.com
